title: A Visit to Don's Produce Arena WI

tasks.task: Planting and managing sweet potatoes and tomatoes.
subtasks: Hand planting sweet potatoes in the field.
Ensuring proper irrigation after planting to facilitate establishment.
Using a water pump powered by a tractor's PTO to irrigate fields.
Regulating water application speed for desired moisture levels.
Observing potato growth and moisture needs.
Harvesting tomatoes when fully ripe, starting from the bottom.
Using beehives and bumblebees for tomato pollination.
Managing tomato vines through leaning and lowering to prevent damage.
Watering tomato plants through individual feed tubes in volcanic media.
Dealing with cat-facing in tomatoes due to cold temperatures during pollination.

tasks.task: Showcasing farming practices at a farmers market.
subtasks: Touring a greenhouse with vertical stacking systems for strawberry and leafy green cultivation.
Explaining the use of pipes and feed tubes for watering and system efficiency.
Highlighting the expansion of farming operations through vertical agricultural techniques.
Addressing the benefits of early planting (February) for certain tomato varieties.
Demonstrating the ease of harvest with rotating stacker systems.
